spells.name: Planar Adaptation
spells.description: Resist harmful effects of a plane.

spells.name: Planar Binding, Lesser
spells.description: Traps elemental creature of 6 HD or less until it performs a task.

spells.name: Summon Monster V
spells.description: Summons elemental creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Overland Flight
spells.description: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

spells.name: Hungry Pit
spells.description: As create pit, but dealing 4d6 damage to those in it as it closes.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.description: Creates passage through wood or stone wall.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

spells.name: Fire Snake
spells.description: Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.

spells.name: Geyser
spells.description: Creates a geyser of boiling water.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description: Kills 3 HD or less; 4–6 HD save or die; 6+ HD take Con damage.

spells.name: Geyser
spells.description: Creates a geyser of boiling water.
